title: About Me
content: Senior Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and DevOps engineering. AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner and AI Practitioner with expertise in Java, Python, PHP, Angular, React, and AWS services. Proven track record of reducing critical incidents by 25% (40 to 30 monthly), accelerating deployment times by 30%, and delivering $150K+ annual cost savings through infrastructure optimization.

Currently leading platform stability initiatives and cross-functional teams at Freelancer Outsourcing UK Limited, managing AWS infrastructure (EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, CloudWatch) serving 500K+ monthly active users. Specialized in implementing secure authentication solutions with OAuth2 and Keycloak, developing high-performance RESTful APIs, and CI/CD pipeline automation with Docker and Jenkins. Successfully mentored 15+ developers across international markets including Germany, Slovenia, and the UK.

What sets me apart is my ability to translate complex technical challenges into clear business outcomes. Whether it's optimizing AWS infrastructure for cost efficiency, implementing automated testing that reduces deployment risks, or designing scalable architectures that grow with business needs, I focus on delivering solutions that make both technical and financial sense. My Economics background helps me understand the broader business context and ensure every technical decision supports organizational goals.
